title: CI font from Tokyomilk
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724133910im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tokyomilk-dark-logo2_3482.jpg)

I search for the font "TOKYOMILK"  
Can you help me?

Kind regards
author: dasuno

comments.content:
An artificially emboldened **[Telegrafico](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724133910/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Telegrafico%20-%20Regular&fid=3c0a0726a72efc545022904d2d8e53d4&fsize=60&text=TOKYOMILK%20DARK&wrap=2)** looks very close  
(Salvo Nicolosi, 2006, Free for personal use)
